Description: Wooden box; lid and base lost; one tenon remains.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Dr David George Hogarth
Curator's comments: Not marked with tomb number but of the same style as other canopic boxes from tomb 46.
Bibliographic references: Zitman 2010 / The necropolis of Assiut: a case study of local Egyptian funerary culture from the Old Kingdom to the end of the Middle Kingdom (II, 230)
